examples.source:
import { Column } from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 10.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 120.9, type: 'è‹±è¯­' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 2.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 5.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 10.9, type: 'è‹±è¯­' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Feb.', value: 22.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Feb.', value: 32.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Feb.', value: 62.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°-ä¸Š' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Feb.', value: 42.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Mar.', value: 2.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Mar.', value: 5.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Mar.', value: 22.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Mar.', value: 32.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Mar.', value: 42.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Mar.', value: 42.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°-ä¸Š' },
];

const dualAxes = new Column('container', {
  data,
  xField: 'month',
  yField: 'value',
  isGroup: true,
  isStack: true,
  seriesField: 'type',
  groupField: 'name',
});

dualAxes.render();

import { DualAxes } from '@antv/g2plot';

const columnData = [
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 10.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Jan.', value: 120.9, type: 'è‹±è¯­' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 2.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 5.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Feb.', value: 10.9, type: 'è‹±è¯­' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Feb.', value: 22.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Feb.', value: 32.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Feb.', value: 42.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Mar.', value: 2.9, type: 'è¯­æ–‡' },
  { name: 'London', month: 'Mar.', value: 5.9, type: 'æ•°å­¦' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Mar.', value: 22.4, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'Berlin', month: 'Mar.', value: 32.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'beijing', month: 'Mar.', value: 42.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
];

const lineData = [
  { name: 'ç¦è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Jan.', value: 12.9, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'é€è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Jan.', value: 1.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'æ–°è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Jan.', value: 2.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'ç¦è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Feb.', value: 18.9, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'é€è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Feb.', value: 13.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'æ–°è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Feb.', value: 15.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
  { name: 'ç¦è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Mar.', value: 8.9, type: 'ç¾æœ¯' },
  { name: 'é€è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Mar.', value: 6.4, type: 'çº¿æ€§ä»£æ•°' },
  { name: 'æ–°è€å¸ˆ', month: 'Mar.', value: 5.4, type: 'é«˜æ•°' },
];

const dualAxes = new DualAxes('container', {
  data: [columnData, lineData],
  xField: 'month',
  yField: ['value', 'value'],
  geometryOptions: [
    {
      geometry: 'column',
      isGroup: true,
      isStack: true,
      seriesField: 'type',
      groupField: 'name',
    },
    {
      geometry: 'line',
      seriesField: 'name',
      isStack: true,
      smooth: true,
    },
  ],
  tooltip: false,
});

dualAxes.render();

import { Histogram } from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  { value: 1.2 },
  { value: 3.4 },
  { value: 3.7 },
  { value: 4.3 },
  { value: 5.2 },
  { value: 5.8 },
  { value: 6.1 },
  { value: 6.5 },
  { value: 6.8 },

  { value: 9.2 },

  { value: 10.5 },

  { value: 10.8 },
  { value: 11.0 },

const histogramPlot = new Histogram('container', {

  binWidth: 4,
  tooltip: {
    showMarkers: false,
    position: 'top',
  },
  interactions: [
    {
      type: 'element-highlight',
    },
  ],
  /** range ä¸º x è½´ä»£è¡¨å­—æ®µï¼Œcount ä¸º y è½´ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸ªæ•°å­—æ®µ */

    count: {
      max: 20,
      nice: true,
    },
  },
});

histogramPlot.render();

title.en: Set line style through callback function

examples.source:
import { Line } from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  { month: 'Jan', key: 'series1', value: 125 },
  { month: 'Jan', key: 'series2', value: 51 },
  { month: 'Feb', key: 'series1', value: 132 },
  { month: 'Feb', key: 'series2', value: 91 },
  { month: 'Mar', key: 'series1', value: 141 },
  { month: 'Mar', key: 'series2', value: 34 },
  { month: 'Apr', key: 'series1', value: 158 },
  { month: 'Apr', key: 'series2', value: 47 },
  { month: 'May', key: 'series1', value: 133 },
  { month: 'May', key: 'series2', value: 63 },
  { month: 'June', key: 'series1', value: 143 },
  { month: 'June', key: 'series2', value: 58 },
  { month: 'July', key: 'series1', value: 176 },
  { month: 'July', key: 'series2', value: 56 },
  { month: 'Aug', key: 'series1', value: 194 },
  { month: 'Aug', key: 'series2', value: 77 },
  { month: 'Sep', key: 'series1', value: 115 },
  { month: 'Sep', key: 'series2', value: 99 },
  { month: 'Oct', key: 'series1', value: 134 },
  { month: 'Oct', key: 'series2', value: 106 },
  { month: 'Nov', key: 'series1', value: 110 },
  { month: 'Nov', key: 'series2', value: 88 },
  { month: 'Dec', key: 'series1', value: 91 },
  { month: 'Dec', key: 'series2', value: 56 },
];
const line = new Line('container', {
  data,
  xField: 'month',
  yField: 'value',
  legend: false,
  seriesField: 'key',
  stepType: 'hvh',
});

line.render();

examples.source:
import { TinyArea } from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  264,
  417,
  438,
  887,
  309,
  397,
  550,
  575,
  563,
  430,
  525,
  592,
  492,
  467,
  513,
  546,
  983,
  340,
  539,
  243,
  226,
  192,
];

const tinyArea = new TinyArea('container', {
  height: 60,
  width: 300,
  autoFit: false,
  data,
  smooth: true,
});

tinyArea.render();

import { TinyArea } from '@antv/g2plot';

const data = [
  264,
  417,
  438,
  887,
  309,
  397,
  550,
  575,
  563,
  430,
  525,
  592,
  492,
  467,
  513,
  546,
  983,
  340,
  539,
  243,
  226,
  192,
];

const tinyArea = new TinyArea('container', {
  height: 60,
  width: 300,
  autoFit: false,
  data,
  smooth: true,
  areaStyle: {
    fill: '#d6e3fd',
  },
});

tinyArea.render();

tinyLine.render();
